title: 你们去村庄干的第一件事是什么
author: lt19991228

replies.author: 卡拉达之翼
replies.txt_content: 建防线.......造铁傀儡

replies.author: 魔兽xxxx
replies.txt_content: 找铁匠铺，图书馆和农田

replies.author: ricky31415
replies.txt_content: 和村民握握手

replies.author: 林悦彪
replies.txt_content: 看交易，采菜，最重要的是借书，我喜欢看书

replies.author: shrzb521
replies.txt_content: 洗劫一空..

replies.txt_content:

你比我熊

replies.author: 路路路路过
replies.txt_content: 铁匠铺 收菜 围起来繁殖

replies.author: 圣光之子
replies.txt_content: 抢一个房子，开始打怪模式

replies.author: lt19991228
replies.txt_content:

铁匠铺 收菜 围起来繁殖
熊孩子的行为

replies.author: Your_New
replies.txt_content: 图书馆抢夺，把书全挖走。然后拆田，再到铁匠铺

replies.author: Posuker
replies.txt_content: 铁匠铺，收小麦，找书架，以及……喜闻乐见的屠杀（滑稽）

replies.author: RuiFen
replies.txt_content: 搜刮完东西就走，反正区块不会被加载不怕刷怪

replies.author: lt19991228
replies.txt_content:
